content: चारित्रं [चर्-णित्रन् <ls>Uṇ. 4. 171</ls>; चरित्रमेव स्वार्थे अण् वा] (also written चारित्र्यं) {@--1@} Conduct, behaviour, manner of acting. {@--2@} Good name or character, reputation, probity, uprightness, good conduct; अनृतं नाभिधास्यामि चारित्रभ्रंशकारणं <ls>Mk. 3. 26</ls>, <ls n="Mk. 3.">25</ls>; चारित्र्यविहीन आढ्योपि च दुर्गतो भवति <ls n="Mk.">1. 43.</ls> {@--3@} Chastity, purity of life (of women). {@--4@} Disposition, temperament. {@--5@} Peculiar observance or practice. {@--6@} Hereditary observance. --त्रा The tamarind tree.
